sectiondef.header: Copying and filling batches of matrices

Multiplication of batches of triangular matrices

briefdescription.para: Convert the given view or matrix type V (batmat::matrix::View or batmat::matrix::Matrix) to a batched view type using a deduced SIMD type.

detaileddescription.para: This conversion takes place in the wrapper around the optimized implementations (which require views with a proper SIMD-compatible stride).

memberdef.type: simd_view_types< std::remove_const_t< T >, Abi >::template view< T, Order >
memberdef.definition: using batmat::linalg::view = simd_view_types<std::remove_const_t<T>, Abi>::template view<T, Order>
memberdef.name: view

memberdef.type: simd_view_types< std::remove_const_t< T >, Abi >::template matrix< T, Order >
memberdef.definition: using batmat::linalg::matrix = simd_view_types<std::remove_const_t<T>, Abi>::template matrix<T, Order>
memberdef.name: matrix

memberdef.type: simd_view_types< real_t, Abi >::template view< const real_t, Order >
memberdef.definition: using batmat::linalg::real_view = simd_view_types<real_t, Abi>::template view<const real_t, Order>
memberdef.name: real_view

memberdef.type: simd_view_types< real_t, Abi >::template view< real_t, Order >
memberdef.definition: using batmat::linalg::mut_real_view = simd_view_types<real_t, Abi>::template view<real_t, Order>
memberdef.name: mut_real_view

memberdef.type: cached_uview< Order==StorageOrder::ColMajor ? Cols :Rows, T, Abi, Order >
memberdef.definition: cached_uview< Order==StorageOrder::ColMajor ? Cols :Rows, T, Abi, Order > batmat::linalg::with_cached_access
memberdef.name: with_cached_access

memberdef.definition: cached_uview< Cols, T, Abi, StorageOrder::ColMajor > batmat::linalg::with_cached_access
memberdef.name: with_cached_access

memberdef.definition: cached_uview< Rows, T, Abi, StorageOrder::RowMajor > batmat::linalg::with_cached_access
memberdef.name: with_cached_access
